titleStmt.title: A sermon preached to the Parliament, Octob. 13. 1652. A day of solemne humiliation. Concerning the kingdome of Christ, and the power of the civile magistrate about the things of the worship of God. / By John Owen.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the University, for Thomas Robinson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
